content.rendered:
TRANSATLANTIC NETWORK

(Valid in all classes)

 REGIONAL NETWORK

 
1 luggage of 12 kg and an accessory
(computer, handbag, coat, umbrella, camera,
small camera, books, food for baby …).		 1 luggage of 5 kg

Air Caraibes Checked Baggage

Air Caraibes Excess Baggage
